resources.string:
Bangladesh officially the People Republic of Bangladesh, is a country in South Asia
 Capital : Dhaka
 Population : 165 million people
 Currency : Bangladeshi Taka
 Prime Minister : Shekh Hasina
 Official Language : Bangali.

India officially the Republic of India , is a country in South Asia
 Capital : New-Delhi
 Population: 1,417,173,173
 Currency : Indian Rupee
 Prime Minister : Norengdra Modi
 Official Language : Hindi.

Pakistan, populous multiethnic country of South Asia
 Capital : Karachi
 Population : 212 million people
 Currency : Pakistan Rupee
 Prime Minister : Imran Khan
 Official Language : Urdu
